backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining all data types (HeroSectionTheme, Clinic, Service, SocialMediaLink, FooterContent with sections, etc.) and including authorization and blob storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining type aliases for data structures (Position, Color, Clinic, Service, FooterContent, etc.) and a run function for data migrations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four implemented features: FooterManager component creation, drag-and-drop reordering, AdminPanel tab integration, and dynamic Footer rendering.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing summaries of frontend components including App.tsx, hooks, Header, Footer, Hero, Overview, About, Services, Clinics, SocialMedia, EditableContent, ProfileSetupModal, AdminPanel, and various admin manager components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for background, foreground, primary, secondary, accent, borders, and sidebar elements.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with title 'Dr. Malay Akechan - General Physician' and root div mounting point.
frontend/src/.well-known/ic-domains: Internet Computer domain configuration file specifying 'drmalay.in' as the custom domain.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component with ErrorBoundary, ThemeProvider, authentication state management, hash-based routing between home and blogs views, and conditional rendering of AdminPanel and ProfileSetupModal.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: Renders the About section with doctor profile photo, editable content, and credentials card. Handles loading states, errors, and admin-specific editing capabilities.
frontend/src/components/admin/ClinicsMan: Admin interface for managing clinic entries with CRUD operations, image upload with progress tracking, and form validation. Handles clinic data including name, address, contact details, hours, map link, and booking URL.
frontend/src/components/admin/ContentMan: Admin component for managing website images (hero background, doctor photos, clinic images) and hero section content (headline, subtext, buttons). Supports light/dark mode image uploads with preview and CRUD operations.
frontend/src/components/admin/FooterMana: Admin component for managing footer content including contact information, copyright text, footer sections with ordering/dividers, and quick links. Provides add/edit/delete/reorder functionality with change tracking.
frontend/src/components/admin/HeroThemeM: Admin component for configuring hero section visual theme settings including theme type, particle effects, motion effects with patterns, vector effects, and spacing. Provides real-time preview and save functionality.
frontend/src/components/admin/ReviewsMan: Admin component with tabs for managing patient reviews (CRUD operations with optional patient images and star ratings) and review panel settings (display toggles, title/subtitle configuration). Includes duplicate submission guards.
frontend/src/components/admin/ServicesMa: Admin component for managing medical services with name and description fields. Provides simple CRUD operations (add, edit, delete) through a dialog interface with form validation.
frontend/src/components/admin/SocialMedi: Admin component for managing social media links with CRUD operations, including platform, display name, URL, icon size, order, and visibility settings. Uses dialog forms for add/edit operations and displays links in a sortable list.
frontend/src/components/AdminPanel.tsx: Main admin panel component with tabbed interface for managing content, hero theme, clinics, services, reviews, social media, and footer. Includes close button and tab navigation.
frontend/src/components/blogs/BlogDetail: Displays a single blog post with formatted date, author, and rich content rendering. Includes an edit button for admin users.
frontend/src/components/blogs/BlogList.t: Renders a list of blog posts sorted by creation date with preview text, metadata, and admin controls for editing and deleting posts. Includes confirmation dialog for deletions.
frontend/src/components/blogs/BlogPostEd: Dialog component for creating and editing blog posts with support for multiple content blocks (text and images), image upload with progress tracking, and rich text editing. Handles post creation/update mutations and validation.
frontend/src/components/blogs/RichConten: Renders blog post content elements (text, images, videos) with support for both formatted HTML and plain text, including proper styling and lazy loading for media.
frontend/src/components/blogs/RichTextEd: WYSIWYG rich text editor with toolbar for formatting (headings, bold, italic, lists, links, quotes) using contentEditable and document.execCommand. Provides controlled input with HTML output.
frontend/src/components/BlogsPage.tsx: Blog listing and detail page with admin capabilities to create, edit, and manage blog posts. Handles navigation between list and detail views with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/Clinics.tsx: Displays clinic locations in a grid layout with cards showing address, phone, hours, and appointment links. Includes loading skeletons, error handling, and conditional rendering based on admin status.
frontend/src/components/DoctorCredential: Card component displaying doctor credentials (name, qualifications, specializations, experience, achievements) with editable profile image. Includes admin edit dialog with form inputs for updating credentials.
Reusable component for inline editing of text content fields (overview or about). Provides edit/save/cancel controls for admins and read-only display for non-admins.
frontend/src/components/EditableFooterCo: Provides inline editing for footer fields (address, phone, email, copyright) with edit/save/cancel controls, visible only to admins.
frontend/src/components/EditableHeroCont: Enables admin editing of hero section content (headline, subtext, buttons) via a dialog modal with text and link inputs.
frontend/src/components/EditableImage.ts: Allows admins to upload and update images (including dark mode variants) with progress tracking and fallback placeholders for missing images.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with contact info, quick links, social media icons, and custom sections; supports admin editing and smooth scrolling to page sections.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays sticky header with navigation, theme toggle, authentication controls, and mobile menu; handles routing between home and blogs views.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Renders the hero section with customizable layout, background images, glassmorphism effects, and editable content; applies theme-based styling and positioning overrides.
frontend/src/components/hero/effects/Mot: Renders animated canvas-based motion effects (wave or floating) for hero sections with Material Design styling, configurable speed and amplitude, and smooth fade-in transitions.
frontend/src/components/hero/effects/Par: Renders animated canvas-based particle effects (bubbles, sparkles, confetti, or dots) with configurable intensity and speed, featuring Material Design elevation and smooth animations.
frontend/src/components/hero/effects/Vec: Renders SVG-based vector effects (geometric patterns or animated paths) with configurable complexity and color schemes, featuring glow filters and smooth animations.
frontend/src/components/hero/FloatingMed: Empty component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/hero/HeroMultiEf: Composite layer component that conditionally renders particle, motion, and vector effects based on their enabled states and overall layer enablement.
frontend/src/components/hero/HeroSpecial: Empty component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/Overview.tsx: Displays an overview section with editable content and four highlight cards (Expert Care, Patient-Centered, Experienced, Trusted) with icons and gradients. Includes loading skeletons, error handling, and admin-only editing capabilities.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog that prompts new users to enter their name for profile setup. Prevents closing until the form is submitted and uses mutation hook to save the profile.
frontend/src/components/Reviews.tsx: Displays customer reviews in a horizontally scrollable carousel with optional auto-scroll, manual navigation buttons, and configurable settings (max reviews, scroll speed). Includes deduplication logic and loading/error states.
frontend/src/components/Services.tsx: Renders a grid of service cards with gradient accents, loading skeletons, and error handling. Shows services only if available or if user is admin.
frontend/src/components/SocialMedia.tsx: Displays social media links as icon buttons with platform detection (Facebook, Twitter/X, Instagram, LinkedIn, YouTube, GitHub). Shows only visible links to non-admin users and includes loading/error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query, handling identity changes and invalidating dependent queries when the actor updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useHeroLayoutPreset.t: Custom hook that analyzes hero images to determine optimal layout configuration (content position, overlay strength, container width, text size) based on image characteristics like brightness, contrast, and visual weight.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options for idle handling and derivation origins.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data including user profiles, website content, footer content, doctor credentials, clinics, services, reviews, blog posts, and admin authorization checks.
frontend/src/ic-assets.json: Configuration file specifying that `.well-known` directory should not be ignored during asset processing.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a high-tech multicolor design system for both light and dark modes, including primary (electric blue), secondary (purple), accent (cyan), and chart colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/utils/heroImageAnalysis.ts: Client-side utility that analyzes hero background images using canvas to determine brightness, contrast, left/right visual weight, and busyness for optimal content layout decisions.
frontend/src/utils/heroThemeDefaults.ts: Utility functions for safely handling hero theme data including bigint conversions, clamping values, normalizing theme objects, and extracting effective dimensions and positions with fallback defaults.
frontend/src/utils/particleEffectTypes.t: Defines metadata for particle effect types (bubbles, confetti, sparkles, dots, rings, swirls, lines, medical symbols) with helper functions to retrieve labels and descriptions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support and methods to clear parameters from URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration file that defines custom theme extensions including color schemes (using CSS variables), container settings, border radius, box shadows, and integrates typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file for a healthcare website with admin panel, documenting existing features for footer management (FooterManager component, drag-and-drop reordering, AdminPanel integration) and pending backend data model extensions.
